javadoc: Represents a possible way for a {@link Loader} to load something.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Constructs a LoadSpec from a manually supplied LanguageCompilerSpecPair.

params.name: imageBase
params.comment: The desired image base address for the load.

params.name: languageCompilerSpec
params.comment:
The language/compiler spec ID.  If this is not needed or not 
   known, use #LoadSpec(Loader, long, boolean).

params.name: isPreferred
params.comment: true if this LoadSpec is preferred; otherwise, false.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Constructs a LoadSpec from a QueryResult.

params.name: imageBase
params.comment: The desired image base address for the load.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment:
Constructs a LoadSpec with an unknown language/compiler.  Some Loader's do
 not require a language/compiler.

params.name: imageBase
params.comment: The desired image base address for the load.

params.name: requiresLanguageCompilerSpec
params.comment:
True if this LoadSpec requires a
   language/compiler; otherwise, false.  If a language/compiler is required, it will have
   to be supplied to the Loader by some other means, and this LoadSpec will
   be considered incomplete.

methods.javadoc:
Gets this {@link LoadSpec}'s {@link Loader}.
@return This {@link LoadSpec}'s {@link Loader}.
methods.name: getLoader

methods.javadoc:
Gets the desired image base to use during the load.
@return The desired image base to use during the load.
methods.name: getDesiredImageBase
methods.comment: Gets the desired image base to use during the load.

return.comment: The desired image base to use during the load.

methods.name: getLanguageCompilerSpec

return.comment:
This LoadSpec's LanguageCompilerSpecPair.  Could be null if this
   LoadSpec doesn't need or know the language/compiler.

methods.javadoc:
Gets whether or not this {@link LoadSpec} is a preferred {@link LoadSpec}.
@return True if this {@link LoadSpec} is a preferred {@link LoadSpec}; otherwise, false.
methods.name: isPreferred
methods.comment: Gets whether or not this LoadSpec is a preferred LoadSpec.

return.comment: True if this LoadSpec is a preferred LoadSpec; otherwise, false.

methods.name: requiresLanguageCompilerSpec
methods.comment: Gets whether or not this LoadSpec requires a language/compiler to load something.

return.comment:
True if this LoadSpec requires a language/compiler to load something; 
   otherwise, false.

methods.javadoc:
Gets whether or not this {@link LoadSpec} is complete.  A {@link LoadSpec} is not considered
 complete if it requires a language/compiler to load something, but the language/compiler
 is currently unknown.
@return True if this {@link LoadSpec} is complete; otherwise, false.
methods.name: isComplete
methods.comment:
Gets whether or not this LoadSpec is complete.  A LoadSpec is not considered
 complete if it requires a language/compiler to load something, but the language/compiler
 is currently unknown.

return.comment: True if this LoadSpec is complete; otherwise, false.

name: LoadSpec
comment: Represents a possible way for a Loader to load something.
